room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: It was really fun and challenging! It was a blast to work as a team and solve all the clues of the escape room. I had fun!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: I took my retail team here (we're in the Forum Shops) for a team building get together. So fun!!!I got anxiety...but the team kept me going!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Super fun thrilling, on your toes. Team work is the key. My first time doing it ! Highly recommend the escape room game
